ai-kv8.11:1.1_0: Without giving up deeds, they become causing themselves.
ai-kv8.11:1.3_0: The stream-enterer falls away from the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-kv8.11:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:1.5_0: Without giving up deeds, they become causing themselves.
ai-kv8.11:1.7_0: ‘I give up bad for the sake of work.’ ...
ai-kv8.11:1.8_0: the non-returner, and he falls away from the fruit of non-return.
ai-kv8.11:1.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:2.1_0: The stream-enterer doesn’t decline in the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-kv8.11:2.3_0: With no cause or reason, they don’t decline.
ai-kv8.11:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:2.5_0: ‘I give up bad for the sake of work.’ ...
ai-kv8.11:2.6_0: the non-returner, does not decline in the fruit of non-return.
ai-kv8.11:2.8_0: With no cause or reason, they don’t decline.
ai-kv8.11:2.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:3.1_0: Without giving up deeds, they become causing themselves.
ai-kv8.11:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:3.11_0: for the sake of a matricide,
ai-kv8.11:3.12_0: for the sake of a patricide,
ai-kv8.11:3.13_0: for the sake of a perfected one,
ai-kv8.11:3.15_0: because of schism in the Sangha:
ai-kv8.11:3.16_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:4.1_0: What is the root of deeds?
ai-kv8.11:4.2_0: for they come out of the perfected ones.
ai-kv8.11:4.3_0: But if he misrepresents his for the sake of that perfected ones, he loses the cause of suffering.
ai-kv8.11:4.5_0: All the perfected ones realize perfection.
ai-kv8.11:4.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv8.11:4.7_0: The story at work is finished.
ai-kv8.11:5.1_0: Six things being an obstacle for sensual pleasures, the dimension of infinite space, the dimension of infinite consciousness, and the dimension of nothingness are conceived in the formless realm. And there are sights that are effective in the realm of luminous forms that are in the sensual realm.
